title: (x) Spline Drive - Corporate Gothic, Bank Gothic {Mark S, Stephen}
content: This looks soooooo familiar. I would really appreciate any help in determining what these two fonts are..... ![spline drive](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125256im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40690.jpg)
author: aardvrk

comments.content:
The secondary typeface is Bank Gothic.   
No idea about the main one.

Bank Gothic, of course. Thanks a bunch, Stephen and Eduardo!   
   
SPLINE has me stumped. The rounded E and L seem quite distinctive. Hmmmm.
SPLINE is Phil Martin's [Corporate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125256/http:/www.roostertypes.com/view_fullfont.asp?catalogid=3116&issingle=yes). Looks like it's been stretched a bit.
That's it!! Thanks whole bunches, Mark!!! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125256im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
